description: VLM Run is a visual AI platform that extracts data from images, videos, audio, and documents. It helps automate analysis workflows, such as object detection, transcription, image/audio analysis, and document parsing.

actions.name: analyzeAudio
actions.description: Process an audio file, extracting features or transcription

actions.name: analyzeDocument
actions.description: Process a document (PDF, DOCX, etc.), extracting structured data or text.

actions.name: analyzeImage
actions.description: Process an image (file or URL), extracting descriptions, detecting objects, etc.

actions.name: analyzeVideo
actions.description: Analyze a video file or URL, e.g. extract frames, detect content, etc.
